title: Have you been punished in LoL?
body:
I am not trying to start anything like "lyte smite OP" etc, I am just curious how many people this actually affects. I had a 1 week ban in season 3 to constant disconnets from really bad internet connection. I also have had 1 content removal from the boards, I had a discussion that in retrospect, was not allowed.

Aside from that I have had nothing substantial happen, no chat restricts, no in game report issues... 

Hell, I still have my green ribbon :x.

Just curious is all.
